title: If I have a 59% in my English class and I receive a 100% on an assignment that is worth 25% of my grade, will I be passing? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on what the passing grade is. 75% of 59% is about 45%. 25% of 100% is 25%. Add those two together and you get nearly a 70% score for the course. If passing is 70% and given that you did so well on the final exam, if I were your teacher, I would pass you after having a serious discussion about why you did so poorly during the term. That would be a concern for me.
That depends on what your final score needs to be to pass.Your final score will be (59%)(0.75) + (100%)(0.25) = 69.25%.
